title: I am how I feel
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Psychology - Study and teaching

description: Episode of Series "Feelings". One of a series of three films dealing with the question "Who am I?". Presents a series of sketches about the expression of feelings. Ways of handling negative feelings and achieving more positive feelings are shown. All people have the same basic emotions but respond differently in particular situations. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
